education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

responsibilities: Engineered a custom Python web scraper using BeautifulSoup, Pandas, and NumPy to extract and preprocess over 150,000 agricultural blog posts into a MySQL data pipeline.
Deployed Langchain Azure Search embedding and retrieval models, using prompt engineering and a vector database with custom JSON chunking for efficient data retrieval and insight generation.

Boosted marketing campaign reach by 14% and reduced manual social media uptime by 90% by designing and implementing an interactive PowerBI dashboard to display Generative AI insights, ensuring compliance with internal data policies.
Presented project to data analytics executive suite and global leadership stakeholders, effectively communicating technical aspects and development process.

Leading cross-functional research and authoring a whitepaper for a new Proof of Sampling (PoSP) consensus model for Hyperbolic Labs, which optimizes arbitration using decentralized orchestrators and the EigenLayer restaking protocol.

Wrote and deployed 'Cornell Blockchain Coin' (CBC), an ERC-20 token on the Avalanche C-Chain with future plans to integrate into a larger Cornell Blockchain Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) currently in development.

Implementing initial front end core experience using React.js and Node.js while using Figma for prototyping, demonstrating attention to detail in product design and web development based on customer needs.
Launched a feature enabling single-login client switching, generating $9,600 in annual recurring revenue.
Reduced reporting time by 90% through the automation of blockchain transaction accounting from customer wallet data.
Founded during COVID-19 to bring grocery solutions to 200+ high-risk community families and established alternative job opportunities for 15+ displaced Uber and Lyft drivers.
Leveraged AI tools to enhance website SEO, achieving a 30% increase in organic traffic by identifying and targeting high-impact keywords and optimizing content for search engine algorithms.
Developed and managed a React.js-based web platform with 1000+ product pages.

description: Designed and implemented a portfolio website leveraging Llamaindex and the OpenAI API to accurately respond to user queries regarding my personal and professional experiences.
Web application is fully developed in TypeScript and Node.js, deployed on Vercel with DNS management through AWS Route 53.
Created GPTree for HackPrinceton, a full stack React.js based story generation tool that allows writers to organize their ideas and use AI to develop their plot.
Integrated Node.js back end and Express.js server with OpenAI’s GPT-3.5 API to produce dynamic narrative content.
Programmed a Minecraft Forge mod in Java with custom potion effects.
Contributed 15+ bug fixes, optimized code for performance, and demonstrated attention to detail in source code management using Gradle and JSON for texture design.
